author: Denise Breder
text: If anyone has had experience using EJCDC contracts for municipal construction projects, have your experiences been good/bad?  Do you find the contracts to be geared to protecting the interests of the professionals rather than the client (municipality)?  How enforceable have they been?
title: Contracts
